title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: #Bitcoin was created 14 years ago to give people across the planet access to a form of money that cannot be inflated nor minipulated",Dennis Porter founder of Satoshi Act Fund, testified yesterday to the Missouri House of RepresentativesIt was developed by new modern technology thinkers with P2P clue, when it was first introduced the price was less than a dollar, few people occupied the opportunity and many despite the project. BTC grow from zero to hero in few years of existence and afterwards busted in price in 2009, many begins to invest in the project and in 2017 the price moved to $11k, at this point BTC already made many millionaires and billionaires and many still invest at high price value and achieved good journey to this point. There is still hope and enough package to come from BTC, keep holding.https://twitter.com/DocumentingBTC/status/1631090187018043392

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AMIt was developed by new modern technology thinkers with P2P clue,Point of correction, we do not know if Satoshi Nakamoto is a man, woman or a group which is the main point that people needs to let others know, but according to what you said in your post, it will make people to be confused that bitcoin was created by a group of people which means Satoshi is known or known to be a group. No one knows who Satoshi is. Bitcoin adoption has been from its very beginning of its creation, its price has gone up beyond and people later know that bitcoin is just more than p2p but an asset and they buy and holding it while some people are trading it.

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: We are all Satoshi and I hope that man won't be another Faketoshi.Bitcoin prehistory. Your topic title is misleading but let me introduce you that topic.

comments.author: Justtoons
comments.body: If you are trying to make a good topic on the history of Bitcoin carry out some good research don't just read it somewhere and post it. Check out what is correct or wrong learn more about your topic.you should also understand the topic so if anyone ask you a question you would be able to answer them, defending your topic.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AM#Bitcoin was created 14 years ago to give people across the planet access to a form of money that cannot be inflated nor minipulated",Dennis Porter founder of Satoshi Act Fund, testified yesterday to the Missouri House of RepresentativesIt was developed by new modern technology thinkers with P2P clue, when it was first introduced the price was less than a dollar, few people occupied the opportunity and many despite the project. BTC grow from zero to hero in few years of existence and afterwards busted in price in 2009, many begins to invest in the project and in 2017 the price moved to $11k, at this point BTC already made many millionaires and billionaires and many still invest at high price value and achieved good journey to this point. There is still hope and enough package to come from BTC, keep holding.https://twitter.com/DocumentingBTC/status/1631090187018043392And another point of correction is that it is not the first one, you can see where Satoshi took his inspiration at, it was at the footnote of the bitcoin whitepaper. So it was an inspiration from several people.You taking about hope? we are not that desperate, we are still very much alive, bear and bull market, it's just part of the ecosystem.Not sure though if you have experience what you are preaching here, that is to HODL.

comments.author: yohananaomi
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AM#Bitcoin was created 14 years ago to give people across the planet access to a form of money that cannot be inflated nor minipulated",Dennis Porter founder of Satoshi Act Fund, testified yesterday to the Missouri House of RepresentativesIt was developed by new modern technology thinkers with P2P clue, when it was first introduced the price was less than a dollar, few people occupied the opportunity and many despite the project. BTC grow from zero to hero in few years of existence and afterwards busted in price in 2009, many begins to invest in the project and in 2017 the price moved to $11k, at this point BTC already made many millionaires and billionaires and many still invest at high price value and achieved good journey to this point. There is still hope and enough package to come from BTC, keep holding.https://twitter.com/DocumentingBTC/status/1631090187018043392everyone really hopes for bitcoin at this time and it has become an interesting investment and this is certainly beyond everyone's expectations when it was initially introduced, a very unexpected achievement from one Satoshi Nakamoto. it is clear that the journey is quite fast when viewed from all the investments because the developments that have occurred are not expected to go this far and be as valuable as it can even be said to be quite expensive and very profitable for an investment.everyone who has been immersed in investing in bitcoin clearly hopes that bitcoin will continue to increase in the future, there is always new hope in each halving period to come. there are no words to continue to survive and make bitcoin an attractive investment.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AM BTC grow from zero to hero in few years of existence and afterwards busted in price in 2009, many begins to invest in the project and in 2017 the price moved to $11k, at this point BTC already made many millionaires and billionaires and many still invest at high price value and achieved good journey to this point. Why would you say that the price moved to $11K, yet there was a historic all-time high of $20K or close to it at that time?Was I in a different metaverse at that time?

comments.author: Zorigi
comments.body: You tell the history of bitcoin, but in my opinion you tell it incomplete and you also don't include your writing about the bull run in 2021 and also the price at that time.for people who survive and are strong in holding bitcoin, they will definitely have the opportunity to benefit.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Quote from: dzungmobile on March 03, 2023, 08:25:01 AMBitcoin prehistory. Your topic title is misleading but let me introduce you that topic.your proven link I read prehistory begins in 1974, Robert E. Kahn / Vint Cerf TCP/IP = Internet, which I think (that intellection) does not begin from that year (1974) but is older than that year is, but begin from (1644) in London by John Milton.QuoteThis is true liberty, when free-born men,Having to advise the public, may speak free,Which he who can, and will, deserves high praise;Who neither can, nor will, may hold his peace:What can be juster in a state than this?free without being tied down thirds party, or anythingAreopagitica: A Speech for the Liberty of Unlicensed Printing to the Parliament of England

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on March 04, 2023, 10:51:54 PMQuote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AM BTC grow from zero to hero in few years of existence and afterwards busted in price in 2009, many begins to invest in the project and in 2017 the price moved to $11k, at this point BTC already made many millionaires and billionaires and many still invest at high price value and achieved good journey to this point. Why would you say that the price moved to $11K, yet there was a historic all-time high of $20K or close to it at that time?Was I in a different metaverse at that time?The price did ATH at $20k during 2017 but is is also not wrong that BTC move to $11k.  I think you are both in the same metaverse and the same timeline but @OP just posted an early  Bitcoin surge record of $11k which goes up to what you posted as $20k.    And it is true that when BTC surges to $11k, it creates several millionaires if not billionaires in the crypto sphere.Quote from: Zorigi on March 04, 2023, 11:14:04 PMYou tell the history of bitcoin, but in my opinion you tell it incomplete and you also don't include your writing about the bull run in 2021 and also the price at that time.for people who survive and are strong in holding bitcoin, they will definitely have the opportunity to benefit.Also, he failed to state the price crash after the Bitcoin price ATH on 2021.  Maybe @OP is in rush creating this thread.

comments.author: Good_Doctor
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AM#Bitcoin was created 14 years ago to give people across the planet access to a form of money that cannot be inflated nor minipulated",Dennis Porter founder of Satoshi Act Fund, testified yesterday to the Missouri House of Representatives There is still hope and enough package to come from BTC, keep holding.This is so DRY!!! You should come up with deeper and interesting facts about bitcoin. Something like Bitcoin will be 15 years by October...the first transaction between Nakamoto and Hal...the very big all-time high in the year 2020 at the peak of COVID-19... These are fun fact about bitcoin that could make your work beautiful

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AMThere is still hope and enough package to come from BTC, keep holding.One of the best asset to hodl is bitcoin because of it profitability and many investors that have taken decision on this already knows the benefits that comes in bitcoin investment with time, today the same reason for one to invest is also made available for us with the use of this bear season to invest and hodl till we have something good enough to realize over time with our investment, we buy the dip, hodl and sell and the same procedures continues over time as bitcoin keep increasing in value each halving.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: No one is sure about the founder if it is a man or woman as you can read from other reply in this thread and you didn't even include about Bitcoin's price reaching new ATH price. Not that I want you to get offended or something like that or you might think that I am criticizing you but I don't. I just want you to know about it and let you know that there are more information that you should know. I know we are not perfect and make mistakes but mistakes are what will help us make ourselves a better version than yesterday.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: I'm already doubting that it can not be manipulated because of Blackrock's interest in Bitcoin. Once they use the huge amount of money in BTC and buy them all up. I think they will own the network by then. And then they can also use the government to regulate mining with ESG compliance and so on. I remember there were people in a podcast discussing all these and they were worried too. Good to see Dennis Porter testifying for Mining benefits.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Quote from: dzungmobile on March 03, 2023, 08:25:01 AMWe are all Satoshi and I hope that man won't be another Faketoshi.Bitcoin prehistory. Your topic title is misleading but let me introduce you that topic.Really we all are? and I must say your term faketoshi is interesting I should mark it in the dictionary...Topic title is misleading naahh, I don't think it can click betting but I am not sure about it because it's not a view game. Prehistory is not that interesting. I thought it will be something out of the world but it's pretty simple.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on March 03, 2023, 08:17:01 AMQuote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AMIt was developed by new modern technology thinkers with P2P clue,Point of correction, we do not know if Satoshi Nakamoto is a man, woman or a group which is the main point that people needs to let others know, but according to what you said in your post, it will make people to be confused that bitcoin was created by a group of people which means Satoshi is known or known to be a group. No one knows who Satoshi is. [...]That is correct. However we can read every post Satoshi made on the topic of Bitcoin. Actually it's all archived in this forum!Check this profile to read up on it: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3@OP, your post seems kinda random. If you want a deep dive into Bitcoin history, just check Satoshis profile I have linked to above and read some of his posts. Have fun.

comments.author: buwaytress
comments.body: Quote from: Good_Doctor on July 08, 2023, 01:37:53 PMThis is so DRY!!! You should come up with deeper and interesting facts about bitcoin. Something like Bitcoin will be 15 years by October...the first transaction between Nakamoto and Hal...the very big all-time high in the year 2020 at the peak of COVID-19... These are fun fact about bitcoin that could make your work beautiful Please why not let's encourage the rehash writers and Chatgpt warriors. Originality is already so hard to find, the forum uncovers gems every now and then, but only because we don't keep having to look back at past laurels.Years ago, you'd hear of all kinds of people breaking new ground. Traversing South America teaching people about Bitcoin. Getting rebels and misfits in some unrecognised republic in Syria to use Bitcoin. Now it's... shooting Bitcoin to the stars or rewriting "deeper and interesting" yet tired facts. Is that the best we can come up with?

comments.author: Lorence.xD
comments.body: Quote from: Good_Doctor on July 08, 2023, 01:37:53 PMQuote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AM#Bitcoin was created 14 years ago to give people across the planet access to a form of money that cannot be inflated nor minipulated",Dennis Porter founder of Satoshi Act Fund, testified yesterday to the Missouri House of Representatives There is still hope and enough package to come from BTC, keep holding.This is so DRY!!! You should come up with deeper and interesting facts about bitcoin. Something like Bitcoin will be 15 years by October...the first transaction between Nakamoto and Hal...the very big all-time high in the year 2020 at the peak of COVID-19... These are fun fact about bitcoin that could make your work beautiful Exactly, as OP mentioned Bitcoin was 14 years so by those years it would be impossible to have a lot of history about Bitcoin. This is actually a common knowledge for Bitcoin like basic background but if were going to post a thread maybe putting some sources would be good. In the time of pandemic, since people were not allowed to go outside due to covid-19 so almost everyone are using gadgets and crypto became famous especially into my country PH. People invested here despite the mindset of easy money but as we know FOMO is common back days so when the bull run ends. A lot of people also loss a huge amound of assets. Maybe in next decades Bitcoin would fly high up and will change a lot of people's life. From P2P game after it died, they transfer to investing and trading then boom huge loss. Not even doing their own research just to be part of the trend.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: That is your own part of the history. Another person can still narrate the history of bitcoin from another dimension. If the going up and down are the characteristics of  inflation then bitcoin is also self inflated. Bitcoin price was not busted in 2009. I'm 2009 bitcoin was still at it tender age. Yes bitcoin has spent 14 good years in the internet and people are using it in different ways and yet many people are still Sceptical and don't know what is bitcoin. The history of bitcoin something that every beginner of bitcoin supposed know before going into the uses. Mostly if you are here, the first thing to do is to know what is bitcoin and it characteristics before other things.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on July 08, 2023, 05:03:07 PMI'm already doubting that it can not be manipulated because of Blackrock's interest in Bitcoin. Once they use the huge amount of money in BTC and buy them all up. I think they will own the network by then. And then they can also use the government to regulate mining with ESG compliance and so on. I remember there were people in a podcast discussing all these and they were worried too. Isn't it the best time to accumulate Bitcoin?  Because if it so happen that Blackrock's interest in Bitcoin will make them to buy all Bitcoin in the market then those who are holding will greatly profit from this action.  This is manipulation that can do good for the holders until they decided to take profit and crash the price then rinse and repeat.  But whatever their intention holding and accumulating Bitcoin is not a bad idea at all we just need to time when we will sell at a profit and restock with a huge discount.  After all, Bitcoin market is always been like this ever since which is why there is this so called 4 year cycles that shows how Bitcoin price has its movement pattern.Quote from: Mate2237 on July 08, 2023, 06:32:39 PMThat is your own part of the history. Another person can still narrate the history of bitcoin from another dimension. If the going up and down are the characteristics of  inflation then bitcoin is also self inflated. Bitcoin price was not busted in 2009. I'm 2009 bitcoin was still at it tender age. Yes bitcoin has spent 14 good years in the internet and people are using it in different ways and yet many people are still Sceptical and don't know what is bitcoin. One reason for this is that not all people have access to technology like in my country, provinces and rural areas have problem accessing the internet since ISP are too focused on the urban area, the rural area are being left out which resulted in delayed information and possibly information black out.
